category.name: Cross Probing.Search Mechanism
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: CUSTOM_NOTES_REV_RULE
preference.preference_description: Specifies the internal name of the revision rule used when objects of type "Fnd0ListsCustomNotes" are associated to an Item or an Item Revision through the "Fnd0ListsParamReqments" relation. The value should match the internal name of one of the revision rules defined in the Structure Manager application. If the value is set to "Imprecise", the "Fnd0ListsCustomNotes" object itself is associated, not any of its revisions. The default value is "Imprecise".
